title: Redeploy application with existing content preservation

requirements.text: Redeploy the current application (Version 12) to production while ensuring all existing backend data is preserved, including articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom entries, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links, and mission content

quotes: 3 please. Will save me time having to re-enter all the info

acceptanceCriteria: All existing articles remain accessible after deployment
All X posts and their images are preserved
All spotlight entries with their content and images remain intact
All cybercrime articles with thumbnails are preserved
All home page links with thumbnails remain functional
Mission content including title, description, and images is preserved
No data loss occurs during the deployment process

requirements.text: Verify that the Additional Resources tab, delete buttons across all content types, and home page links with thumbnails (features from Version 12) remain functional after redeployment
acceptanceCriteria: Additional Resources tab is accessible in the navigation
Delete buttons appear on all content types (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links)
Home page links section displays with thumbnails
All CRUD operations work as expected post-deployment

constraints: Must preserve all existing backend data during redeployment
Must maintain the current Version 12 functionality including Additional Resources tab and delete buttons
Must use the existing migration.mo to ensure state preservation
nonGoals: Modifying the data schema or backend structure
Changing the UI or design elements
